notesStmt.note: Wor 6v has this as R3 for Tuesday of the Week, giving a cue for the R and the V in full, but with only minor variants in the music notation and none at all in the words

rBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd Alb2 Evm Mch Cdm Wcb Ely Wor Glo Bat

res.rBody: Ecce dies veniunt Ecce dies venient dicit dominus et suscitabo David germen iustum et regnabit rex et sapiens erit et faciet iudicium et iustitiam in terra et hoc est nomen quod vocabunt eum dominus iustus noster

vBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd Alb2 Evm Mch Cdm Wcb Ely Wor Glo Bat

verses.vBody: In diebus illis salvabitur Juda et Israel habitabit confidenter

rep.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd Alb2 Evm Cdm Wcb Ely Wor Glo Bat
